string;           // \"Color.Emerald.400\"\n  name: string;           // \"Emerald 400\"\n  value: string | number; // \"#34d399\" or 24\n  type: string;           // \"color\" | \"number\"\n  cssVariable: string;    // \"--primitives-color-emerald-400\"\n  reference?: string;     // \"{Primitives.modes.Default.Color.Emerald.400}\"\n  wpVariable?: string;    // \"--wp--preset--color--brand\"\n}\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### CSS Variable Naming Convention\n- Primitives: &#96;--primitives-{group}-{name}-{shade}&#96;\n- Semantic: &#96;--semantic-{category}-{role}&#96;\n- Components: &#96;--component-{component}-{property}&#96;\n- Greenshift: &#96;--wp--{preset|custom|style}--{path}&#96;\n\n---\n\n## ğŸ“ Session Notes\n\n### {
  "contents": "/**\n * GET /api/tokens/semantic\n * \n * Returns semantic tokens (role-based: Brand, Background, Text, Status, etc.)\n * Query params:\n *   - mode: 'Light' | 'Dark' (default: 'Light')\n *   - resolve: 'true' | 'false' (default: 'true') - whether to resolve references\n */\n\nimport { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';\nimport {\n  parseSemantic,\n  resolveAllTokens,\n  getTokenStats,\n  TokenApiResponse,\n  TokenLayer,\n  TokenType,\n} from '@/lib/tokens';\n\nexport async function GET(request: NextRequest) {\n  try {\n    const searchParams = request.nextUrl.searchParams;\n    const mode = (searchParams.get('mode') as 'Light' | 'Dark') || 'Light';\n    const shouldResolve = searchParams.get('resolve') !== 'false';\n    \n    let tokens = parseSemantic(mode);\n    \n    if (shouldResolve) {\n      tokens = resolveAllTokens(tokens);\n    }\n    \n    const stats = getTokenStats(tokens);\n    const types = [...new Set(tokens.map(t =&gt; t.type))] as TokenType[];\n    \n    const response: TokenApiResponse = {\n      collection: 'Semantic',\n      mode,\n      tokens,\n      metadata: {\n        count: tokens.length,\n        types,\n        modes: ['Light', 'Dark'],\n        lastUpdated: new Date().toISOString(),\n        layer: TokenLayer.Semantic,\n      },\n    };\n    \n    return NextResponse.json(response);\n  } catch (error) {\n    console.error('Error fetching semantic tokens:', error);\n    return NextResponse.json(\n      { error: 'Failed to fetch semantic tokens' },\n      { status: 500 }\n    );\n  }\n}\n",

=============================================================================\n\n/** Parsed token with resolved metadata */\nexport interface ParsedToken {\n  /** Full path: \"Color.Emerald.400\" */\n  path: string;\n  /** Display name: \"Emerald 400\" */\n  name: string;\n  /** Resolved final value: \"#34d399\" or 24 */\n  value: string | number;\n  /** Original value (may be reference): \"{Primitives.modes.Default.Color.Emerald.400}\" */\n  originalValue: string | number;\n  /** Token type */\n  type: TokenType;\n  /** CSS variable name: \"--primitives-color-emerald-400\" */\n  cssVariable: string;\n  /** Collection name */\n  collection: string;\n  /** Mode name */\n  mode: string;\n  /** Token layer */\n  layer: TokenLayer;\n  /** Reference string if value references another token */\n  reference?: TokenReference;\n  /** WordPress variable (Greenshift only) */\n  wpVariable?: string;\n  /** Optional description */\n  description?: string;\n}\n\n/** Token with its full reference chain */\nexport interface TokenWithChain extends ParsedToken {\n  /** Chain of tokens from this token to the primitive value */\n  referenceChain: ParsedToken[];\n  /** Tokens that reference this token */\n  referencedBy: ParsedToken[];\n}\n\n// =============================================================================\n// REFERENCE CHAIN TYPES\n// =============================================================================\n\n/** A single step in a reference chain */\nexport interface ReferenceChainStep {\n  /** The token at this step */\n  token: ParsedToken;\n  /** Position in chain (0 = start, higher = closer to primitive) */\n  depth: number;\n  /** Is this the final resolved value? */\n  isFinal: boolean;\n}\n\n/** Complete reference chain from one token to its primitive source */\nexport interface ReferenceChain {\n  /** Starting token (e.g., Greenshift variable) */\n  source: ParsedToken;\n  /** All steps in the chain */\n  steps: ReferenceChainStep[];\n  /** Final resolved primitive value */\n  resolvedValue: string | number;\n  /** Total chain depth */\n  depth: number;\n}\n\n// =============================================================================\n// API RESPONSE TYPES\n// =============================================================================\n\n/** Metadata included in API responses */\nexport interface TokenResponseMetadata {\n  /** Total count of tokens */\n  count: number;\n  /** Token types present */\n  types: TokenType[];\n  /** Modes available */\n  modes: string[];\n  /** Last updated timestamp */\n  lastUpdated: string;\n  /** Layer/collection name */\n  layer: TokenLayer;\n}\n\n/** Standard API response for token endpoints */\nexport interface TokenApiResponse {\n  /** Collection name */\n  collection: string;\n  /** Current mode (if applicable) */\n  mode?: string;\n  /** Array of parsed tokens */\n  tokens: ParsedToken[];\n  /** Response metadata */\n  metadata: TokenResponseMetadata;\n}\n\n/** API response for a single token with full chain */\nexport interface TokenDetailResponse {\n  /** The requested token */\n  token: TokenWithChain;\n  /** Related tokens in same group */\n  siblings?: ParsedToken[];\n}\n\n/** Export format options */\nexport type ExportFormat = 'css' | 'json' | 'figma' | 'wordpress';\n\n/** Export API request */\nexport interface ExportRequest {\n  /** Format to export */\n  format: ExportFormat;\n  /** Mode to export */\n  mode?: string;\n  /** Specific layers to include */\n  layers?: TokenLayer[];\n  /** Include custom overrides */\n  overrides?: Record&lt;string, string | number&gt;;\n}\n\n/** Export API response */\nexport interface ExportResponse {\n  /** Exported content */\n  content: string;\n  /** File extension */\n  extension: string;\n  /** MIME type */\n  mimeType: string;\n  /** Suggested filename */\n  filename: string;\n}\n\n// =============================================================================\n// FILTER &amp; SEARCH TYPES\n// =============================================================================\n\n/** Token search/filter criteria */\nexport interface TokenFilter {\n  /** Search query */\n  query?: string;\n  /** Filter by layer(s) */\n  layers?: TokenLayer[];\n  /** Filter by type(s) */\n  types?: TokenType[];\n  /** Filter by mode */\n  mode?: string;\n  /** Filter by category/group */\n  category?: string;\n  /** Only tokens with references */\n  hasReference?: boolean;\n}\n\n/** Grouped token results */\nexport interface TokenGroup {\n  /** Group name/path */\n  name: string;\n  /** Display label */\n  label: string;\n  /** Tokens in this group */\n  tokens: ParsedToken[];\n  /** Subgroups */\n  subgroups?: TokenGroup[];\n}\n\n// =============================================================================\n// COLOR PALETTE TYPES\n// =============================================================================\n\n/** Single color swatch */\nexport interface ColorSwatch {\n  /** Shade level (50-950) or name (White, Black) */\n  shade: string;\n  /** Hex color value */\n  hex: string;\n  /** CSS variable name */\n  cssVariable: string;\n  /** Is this a light shade (for text contrast) */\n  isLight: boolean;\n}\n\n/** Complete color family/palette */\nexport interface ColorPalette {\n  /** Family name (Emerald, Blue, etc.) */\n  name: ColorFamily;\n  /** Display name */\n  displayName: string;\n  /** Array of swatches */\n  swatches: ColorSwatch[];\n  /** Category (Neutral, Warm, Cool, etc.) */\n  category: 'neutral' | 'warm' | 'cool' | 'blue' | 'pink' | 'base';\n}\n\n// =============================================================================\n// SPACING &amp; SIZE TYPES\n// =============================================================================\n\n/** Spacing token with visual metadata */\nexport interface SpacingToken extends ParsedToken {\n  /** Pixel value */\n  pixels: number;\n  /** Rem value */\n  rem: number;\n  /** Scale key (0, 1, 2, etc.) */\n  scaleKey: string;\n}\n\n/** Radius token with visual metadata */\nexport interface RadiusToken extends ParsedToken {\n  /** Pixel value */\n  pixels: number;\n  /** Scale key (sm, md, lg, etc.) */\n  scaleKey: RadiusKey;\n}\n\n// =============================================================================\n// COMPONENT TOKEN TYPES\n// =============================================================================\n\n/** Button component tokens */\nexport interface ButtonTokens {\n  background: {\n    default: ParsedToken;\n    hover: ParsedToken;\n  };\n  text: ParsedToken;\n  radius: ParsedToken;\n  paddingX: ParsedToken;\n  paddingY: ParsedToken;\n  height: {\n    sm: ParsedToken;\n    md: ParsedToken;\n    lg: ParsedToken;\n  };\n  secondary: {\n    background: ParsedToken;\n    backgroundHover: ParsedToken;\n    text: ParsedToken;\n  };\n  outline: {\n    background: ParsedToken;\n    border: ParsedToken;\n    text: ParsedToken;\n    hoverBackground: ParsedToken;\n  };\n}\n\n/** Card component tokens */\nexport interface CardTokens {\n  background: ParsedToken;\n  border: ParsedToken;\n  text: ParsedToken;\n  radius: ParsedToken;\n  padding: ParsedToken;\n}\n\n/** Input component tokens */\nexport interface InputTokens {\n  background: ParsedToken;\n  border: {\n    default: ParsedToken;\n    focus: ParsedToken;\n  };\n  radius: ParsedToken;\n  paddingX: ParsedToken;\n  paddingY: ParsedToken;\n  height: ParsedToken;\n  text: ParsedToken;\n  placeholder: ParsedToken;\n}\n\n// =============================================================================\n// UTILITY TYPES\n// =============================================================================\n\n/** Deep partial type */\nexport type DeepPartial&lt;T&gt; = {\n  [P in keyof T]?: T[P] extends object ? DeepPartial&lt;T[P]&gt; : T[P];\n};\n\n/** Extract keys of type */\nexport type KeysOfType&lt;T, U&gt; = {\n  [K in keyof T]: T[K] extends U ? K : never;\n}[keyof T];\n\n/** CSS variable name format */\nexport type CSSVariableName = &#96;--${string}&#96;;\n\n/** WordPress variable name format */\nexport type WPVariableName = &#96;--wp--${string}&#96;;\n",
  "totalLinesInFile": 548
}
```

cssVariable: '--primitives-color-base-black' },\n      { shade: 'Transparent', hex: '#00000000', cssVariable: '--primitives-color-base-transparent' },\n    ],\n  },\n];\n\nexport default function PrimitiveColorsPage() {\n  const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState('');\n  const [selectedShade, setSelectedShade] = useState&lt;{ palette: string; shade: string; hex: string; cssVariable: string } | null&gt;(null);\n  const [copiedAll, setCopiedAll] = useState(false);\n\n  // Filter palettes based on search\n  const filteredPalettes = useMemo(() =&gt; {\n    if (!searchQuery) return COLOR_PALETTES;\n    const query = searchQuery.toLowerCase();\n    return COLOR_PALETTES.filter(\n      (p) =&gt;\n        p.name.toLowerCase().includes(query) ||\n        p.displayName.toLowerCase().includes(query) ||\n        p.shades.some((s) =&gt; s.hex.toLowerCase().includes(query))\n    );\n  }, [searchQuery]);\n\n  // Export all as CSS\n  const handleExportCSS = async () =&gt; {\n    const cssContent = COLOR_PALETTES.flatMap((palette) =&gt;\n      palette.shades.map((shade) =&gt; &#96;  ${shade.cssVariable}: ${shade.hex};&#96;)\n    ).join('\\n');\n\n    const fullCSS = &#96;:root {\\n  /* Primitive Color Tokens */\\n${cssContent}\\n}&#96;;\n\n    try {\n      await navigator.clipboard.writeText(fullCSS);\n      setCopiedAll(true);\n      setTimeout(() =&gt; setCopiedAll(false), 2000);\n    } catch (err) {\n      console.error('Failed to copy:', err);\n    }\n  };\n\n  // Handle swatch click\n  const handleSwatchClick = (palette: string, shade: string, hex: string, cssVariable: string) =&gt; {\n    setSelectedShade({ palette, shade, hex, cssVariable });\n  };\n\n  return (\n    &lt;div style={{ maxWidth: 'var(--layout-7xl)' }}&gt;\n      {/* Header */}\n      &lt;div style={{ marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-6)' }}&gt;\n        {/* Breadcrumb */}\n        &lt;div style={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: 'var(--spacing-2)', marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-4)' }}&gt;\n          &lt;Link\n            href=\"/tokens\"\n            style={{\n              fontSize: 'var(--font-size-label)',\n              color: 'var(--color-muted)',\n              textDecoration: 'none',\n            }}\n          &gt;\n            Tokens\n          &lt;/Link&gt;\n          &lt;ChevronRight size={14} style={{ color: 'var(--color-muted)' }} /&gt;\n          &lt;Link\n            href=\"/tokens/primitives\"\n            style={{\n              fontSize: 'var(--font-size-label)',\n              color: 'var(--color-muted)',\n              textDecoration: 'none',\n            }}\n          &gt;\n            Primitives\n          &lt;/Link&gt;\n          &lt;ChevronRight size={14} style={{ color: 'var(--color-muted)' }} /&gt;\n          &lt;span style={{ fontSize: 'var(--font-size-label)', color: 'var(--color-foreground)', fontWeight: 500 }}&gt;\n            Colors\n          &lt;/span&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n\n        &lt;div style={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'flex-start', justifyContent: 'space-between', flexWrap: 'wrap', gap: 'var(--spacing-4)' }}&gt;\n          &lt;div&gt;\n            &lt;h1\n              style={{\n                fontSize: 'var(--font-size-h3)',\n                fontWeight: 700,\n                color: 'var(--color-foreground)',\n                marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-2)',\n              }}\n            &gt;\n              Color Palettes\n            &lt;/h1&gt;\n            &lt;p\n              style={{\n                fontSize: 'var(--font-size-body)',\n                color: 'var(--color-muted)',\n                lineHeight: 'var(--line-height-relaxed)',\n                maxWidth: '65ch',\n              }}\n            &gt;\n              22 color families with 11 shades each (50-950), plus base colors. These are the raw\n              color values used by semantic tokens throughout the design system.\n            &lt;/p&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n\n          {/* Export Button */}\n          &lt;button\n            onClick={handleExportCSS}\n            style={{\n              display: 'flex',\n              alignItems: 'center',\n              gap: 'var(--spacing-2)',\n              padding: 'var(--spacing-2) var(--spacing-4)',\n              backgroundColor: copiedAll ? 'var(--color-success)' : 'var(--color-brand)',\n              color: 'white',\n              border: 'none',\n              borderRadius: 'var(--radius-lg)',\n              fontSize: 'var(--font-size-label)',\n              fontWeight: 500,\n              cursor: 'pointer',\n              transition: 'all var(--duration-150) var(--ease-out)',\n            }}\n          &gt;\n            {copiedAll ? &lt;Check size={16} /&gt; : &lt;Download size={16} /&gt;}\n            {copiedAll ? 'Copied!' : 'Export CSS'}\n          &lt;/button&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n\n      {/* Stats */}\n      &lt;div\n        style={{\n          display: 'flex',\n          gap: 'var(--spacing-6)',\n          marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-6)',\n          flexWrap: 'wrap',\n        }}\n      &gt;\n        {[\n          { label: 'Color Families', value: '22' },\n          { label: 'Shades per Family', value: '11' },\n          { label: 'Total Colors', value: '245' },\n          { label: 'Base Colors', value: '3' },\n        ].map((stat) =&gt; (\n          &lt;div key={stat.label} style={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'baseline', gap: 'var(--spacing-2)' }}&gt;\n            &lt;span style={{ fontSize: 'var(--font-size-h5)', fontWeight: 700, color: 'var(--color-brand)' }}&gt;\n              {stat.value}\n            &lt;/span&gt;\n            &lt;span style={{ fontSize: 'var(--font-size-label)', color: 'var(--color-muted)' }}&gt;\n              {stat.label}\n            &lt;/span&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n        ))}\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n\n      {/* Search */}\n      &lt;div\n        style={{\n          position: 'relative',\n          marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-6)',\n          maxWidth: 400,\n        }}\n      &gt;\n        &lt;Search\n          size={18}\n          style={{\n            position: 'absolute',\n            left: 'var(--spacing-3)',\n            top: '50%',\n            transform: 'translateY(-50%)',\n            color: 'var(--color-muted)',\n          }}\n        /&gt;\n        &lt;input\n          type=\"text\"\n          placeholder=\"Search colors...\"\n          value={searchQuery}\n          onChange={(e) =&gt; setSearchQuery(e.target.value)}\n          style={{\n            width: '100%',\n            padding: 'var(--spacing-2-5) var(--spacing-3)',\n            paddingLeft: 'var(--spacing-10)',\n            backgroundColor: 'var(--color-card)',\n            border: '1px solid var(--color-card-border)',\n            borderRadius: 'var(--radius-lg)',\n            fontSize: 'var(--font-size-body-small)',\n            color: 'var(--color-foreground)',\n            outline: 'none',\n          }}\n        /&gt;\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n\n      {/* Color Grid */}\n      &lt;ColorPaletteGrid\n        palettes={filteredPalettes}\n        layer={TokenLayer.Primitives}\n        showFilters={true}\n        showViewToggle={true}\n        swatchSize=\"md\"\n        onSwatchClick={handleSwatchClick}\n      /&gt;\n\n      {/* Selected Color Panel */}\n      {selectedShade &amp;&amp; '900' },\n];\n\n// Simple copy button\nfunction CopyButton({ value, displayValue, variant = 'default' }: { value: string; displayValue?: string; variant?: 'default' | 'primary' | 'muted' }) {\n  const [copied, setCopied] = useState(false);\n\n  const copyToClipboard = async () =&gt; {\n    await navigator.clipboard.writeText(value);\n    setCopied(true);\n    setTimeout(() =&gt; setCopied(false), 2000);\n  };\n\n  const colors = {\n    default: { bg: 'rgba(100, 116, 139, 0.08)', bgHover: 'rgba(100, 116, 139, 0.15)', text: 'var(--color-foreground)' },\n    primary: { bg: 'rgba(42, 175, 184, 0.1)', bgHover: 'rgba(42, 175, 184, 0.2)', text: 'var(--color-brand)' },\n    muted: { bg: 'rgba(100, 116, 139, 0.08)', bgHover: 'rgba(100, 116, 139, 0.15)', text: 'var(--color-muted)' },\n  };\n\n  const style = colors[variant];\n\n  return (\n    &lt;button\n      onClick={copyToClipboard}\n      className=\"inline-flex items-center gap-1.5 font-mono transition-all group\"\n      style={{\n        fontSize: 'var(--font-size-caption)',\n        color: style.text,\n        backgroundColor: copied ?
